request.fhirRequestParameters: {"resourceType":"Parameters","parameter":[{"name":"registerPatient","resource":{"resourceType":"Patient","meta":{"profile":["https://fhir.nhs.uk/STU3/StructureDefinition/CareConnect-GPC-Patient-1"]},"identifier":[{"extension":[{"url":"https://fhir.nhs.uk/STU3/StructureDefinition/Extension-CareConnect-GPC-NHSNumberVerificationStatus-1","valueCodeableConcept":{"coding":[{"system":"https://fhir.nhs.uk/STU3/CodeSystem/CareConnect-NHSNumberVerificationStatus-1","code":"01","display":"Number present and verified"}]}}],"system":"https://fhir.nhs.uk/Id/nhs-number","value":"9651259752"}],"name":[{"use":"official","family":"WITTER","given":["Dennis"]}],"gender":"male","birthDate":"1957-04-27","address":[{"use":"old","line":["1 Trevelyan Square","Boar Lane"],"city":"Leeds","postalCode":"LS1 6AE"},{"use":"temp","line":["1 Trevelyan Square","Boar Lane"],"city":"Leeds","postalCode":"LS1 6AE"}]}}]}
